content.text:
[@cft](@AiBJDta+4boyh2USNGwIagH/wKjeruTcDX2Aj1r/haM=.ed25519) 

That's funny, I was *just* looking at the encrypted message validation today. The [regular expression from ssb-validate](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-validate/blob/48dec51378425dd284762b179ef2e0d703a95798/index.js#L57) requires that it ends with `.box`, but specifically doesn't check the end of the string. There shouldn't be any problems with `.boxV2`, as far as I understand.
